title: Emerald Blossom Jhumkaalu: A Timeless South Indian Treasure
materials: 22K Gold plated base metal with high quality Hyderabadi Polish for a luxurious finish. Features a central square-cut Emerald gemstone
complemented by sparkling high-quality simulated diamonds (CZ). The jhumkas are embellished with delicate pearls.
features: These exquisite jhumka earrings showcase a blend of traditional and contemporary design. The floral motif on the top gives it a delicate look. The body of jhumka showcases delicate flower motifs embellished with simulated diamonds. The dangling pearls add a touch of grace. Traditional craftsmanship ensures enduring quality.
colors: Dominant gold hue with a vibrant green Emerald accent
further enhanced by the pristine sparkle of the simulated diamonds and the soft glow of the pearls.
occasions: and other special occasions such as seemantham (baby shower) or half-saree functions. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary outfits for parties or gatherings.
description: These Jhumkaalu embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry with a modern twist. The high-quality Hyderabadi polish guarantees a radiant and long-lasting shine. The Emerald and simulated diamond combination represents prosperity and elegance. They are incredibly versatile, allowing you to wear them for both traditional and contemporary occasions.
